text: Donald Trump: ‘I Hate My Opponent’  —  He's ready to go personal in next month's debate against Harris.  Advisers are urging restraint.  —  DONALD TRUMP HAS NO PLANS TO HEED the advice of his aides and limit himself to policy contrasts when he debates Kamala Harris.  He wants to make it personal.
